modules.name: trigSeq
modules.description: 16-step pad sequencer with a built-in Open Sound Control (OSC) interface.

modules.name: trigSeq64
modules.description: 64-step pad sequencer with a built-in Open Sound Control (OSC) interface.

modules.name: voltSeq
modules.description: 16-step variable voltage/note sequencer with a built-in Open Sound Control (OSC) interface.

modules.name: multiWave
modules.description: Digital oscillator module with three (3) oscillators/clocks, each with two (2) configurable wave channel outputs.

modules.name: multiScope
modules.description: Visual effects scope, with lissajous mode, that allows three (3) waveforms to be drawn on the same screen/canvas.

modules.name: cvOSCcv
modules.description: Generic Open Sound Control (OSC) module for outputting Rack CVs to OSC and reading in simple OSC messages into Rack CVs.

modules.name: cvOSC Input Expander
modules.description: Expansion module for cvOSCcv. Allows more input CV channels to be sent to OSC.

modules.name: OSCcv Output Expander
modules.description: Expansion module for cvOSCcv. Allows more output CV channels to be received from OSC.
